intro.title: Transportation Options in Nha Trang
intro.description: Nha Trang is a famous tourist city with diverse transportation options serving visitors. Depending on your needs, budget and itinerary, you can choose the suitable means to explore this beautiful coastal city.

moto.description: The most popular and flexible way to explore Nha Trang. Rental prices from 100,000Ä‘ - 170,000Ä‘/day depending on bike type.

Delivery service available, free helmet included

Self-drive or with driver options available
Simple procedures, requires ID and driving license

taxi.description: Convenient transportation within the city. Reputable taxi companies like Mai Linh, Vinasun, Nha Trang Taxi.
features: Safe, convenient, can book via app

bus.description: Budget-friendly transportation within the city. Nha Trang has many bus routes passing through tourist attractions.

moto.serviceNote: To book a motorbike rental, please contact us at least 2 hours in advance

scooter.title: Standard Scooters
scooter.description: Vision, Lead, Air Blade, Vario, Nmax

gallery.title: Motorbike Rental Gallery

procedures.title: Rental Procedures and Conditions:
procedures.description: Motorbike rental procedures are very simple and quick. You just need to leave one of the following documents to rent a bike immediately:

idCard.title: ID Card / Citizen ID
idCard.description: Valid national ID card or citizen identification card

license.title: Driving License
license.description: Valid motorbike or car driving license

procedures.deliveryNote: Free door-to-door delivery service for customers in central Nha Trang area (hotels, train station, bus station)

conditions.title: Rental conditions:
items: Deposit original ID/Citizen ID/Passport or 5 million VND cash
Rent for 3+ days get 10% discount on total bill
Free included: helmet, raincoat, door-to-door delivery (within 3km radius)

importantNotes.title: Important notes:
items: Don't park on the street or roadside. Use safe parking areas
Follow traffic laws: no red light violations, no wrong-way driving, wear helmet
Rental time: 1 day = 24h, if exceeding 6h = 1/2 day charge

touring.title: Explore Nha Trang by Motorbike
touring.description: Motorbike rental is the most flexible and convenient way to explore Nha Trang and surrounding areas. Here are some ideal destinations to explore by motorbike:

baiDai.title: Bai Dai and Bai Doc Let
baiDai.description: Two beautiful, pristine beaches about 20-30km north of Nha Trang center

ninhVan.title: Ninh Van Bay and Lang Co Bay
ninhVan.description: Wild and peaceful scenery, about 60km north of Nha Trang

ponagar.title: Po Nagar Towers
ponagar.description: Ancient Cham historical site, located right in Nha Trang city

daiLanh.title: Dai Lanh Beach and Mui Dien
daiLanh.description: Beautiful coastal road at the border between Khanh Hoa and Phu Yen

tips.title: Motorbike rental tips
items: Always carry personal documents and wear helmet when riding
Check the bike carefully before receiving (brakes, lights, horn, fuel)
Take photos of the bike before receiving to avoid disputes
Follow traffic laws and ride at safe speeds

benefits.title: Advantages of Renting with Nha Trang Insight

newBikes.title: New, Quality Bikes
newBikes.description: All bikes are new, regularly maintained, ensuring safety and good performance

support.title: 24/7 Rescue Support
support.description: Free rescue service within Nha Trang city if the bike breaks down

contactSection.title: Contact us to book today
contactSection.description: Contact us via hotline or social media for consultation and motorbike rental service booking in Nha Trang

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Motorbike Rental in Nha Trang

price.question: How much does motorbike rental cost in Nha Trang?
price.answer: Motorbike rental prices in Nha Trang start from 100,000Ä‘/day for manual bikes (Wave, Sirius), 150,000Ä‘/day for standard scooters (Vision, Air Blade), and 180,000Ä‘/day for premium scooters (PCX, SH Mode).

procedures.question: What are the motorbike rental procedures in Nha Trang?
procedures.answer: Procedures are very simple, you just need to leave your original ID/Citizen ID or Driving License. Can deposit 5 million VND cash as alternative. Rent for 3+ days get 10% discount.

delivery.question: Is door-to-door motorbike delivery available?
delivery.answer: Yes, we provide free door-to-door delivery within 3km radius from Nha Trang center, including hotels, train station, bus station. Contact 2 hours in advance to book.

insurance.question: Are rental motorbikes insured?
insurance.answer: Yes, all bikes are fully insured. We also provide free 24/7 rescue service within Nha Trang city if the bike breaks down.

types.question: What types of motorbikes are available for rent?
types.answer: We have diverse bike types: Manual bikes (Honda Wave, Yamaha Sirius, Jupiter), standard scooters (Honda Vision, Air Blade, Lead, Nmax), premium scooters (PCX, SH Mode, NVX, Vespa).

hero.title: Taxi Service in Nha Trang
hero.subtitle: Detailed information about reputable taxi companies, fares and services in Nha Trang

intro.title: Taxis in Nha Trang
intro.description: Taxi is a popular and convenient means of transportation in Nha Trang. With many reputable taxi companies operating in the area, tourists can easily catch taxis at tourist areas, hotels, restaurants and attractions.
intro.warning: To avoid being overcharged, you should use reputable taxi companies and ask the driver to turn on the meter when getting in the car.

companies.title: Reputable Taxi Companies in Nha Trang

data.name: Mai Linh Taxi
data.description: Mai Linh is one of the largest and most reputable taxi companies in Nha Trang, serving many tourist routes.

data.name: Vinasun Taxi
data.description: Vinasun is a reputable taxi company from Ho Chi Minh City, expanded operations to Nha Trang to serve tourists.

data.name: Taxi Xanh
data.description: Taxi Xanh is a local taxi company with affordable prices, suitable for budget-conscious tourists.

data.name: Sun Taxi
data.description: Sun Taxi provides premium taxi services with luxury vehicles, suitable for group and VIP customers.

data.name: Maxim Taxi
data.description: Maxim Taxi is a local taxi company, familiar with routes and famous tourist spots in Nha Trang.

data.name: Grab
data.description: Grab is a ride-hailing service, familiar with routes and famous tourist spots in Nha Trang.

routes.title: Popular Taxi Routes and Estimated Fares
routes.note: * Estimated fares based on 4-seater taxi rates. Actual prices may vary depending on taxi company, time, traffic conditions and other factors.

tips.title: Tips for Taking Taxis in Nha Trang

items.reputableCompanies: Use only reputable taxi companies - Prioritize major taxi companies like Mai Linh, Vinasun, Nha Trang Taxi to avoid being overcharged.
items.useMeter: Request meter usage - Always ask the driver to turn on the meter when getting in the car.
items.bookByPhone: Book by phone - If possible, book taxis through company hotlines to ensure safety.
items.confirmPrice: Confirm price beforehand - For long routes like from airport to city, confirm fixed price before departure.
items.keepReceipt: Keep receipts - Always request receipts after payment, especially for business expense claims.

fareSection.title: Fares
fareSection.discount: Priority groups: 50% discount for students, elderly and disabled

notesSection.title: Bus Travel Notes
notesSection.cashOnly: Prepare cash for tickets. Some routes don't support card payment yet.
notesSection.checkSchedule: Check bus schedules before traveling, some routes may change on weekends.

dataUpdate.title: Data Update Information
dataUpdate.description: Bus route data is regularly updated to ensure accuracy

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Nha Trang Bus

fare.question: How much are Nha Trang bus fares?
fare.answer: Nha Trang city bus fares are 7,000Ä‘/trip, Cam Ranh airport bus is 50,000Ä‘/trip, monthly pass is 200,000Ä‘. Students, elderly and disabled get 50% discount.

schedule.question: What are Nha Trang bus operating hours?
schedule.answer: City buses operate from 05:00 - 19:00 daily. Cam Ranh airport route operates from 04:00 - 21:00. Bus frequency is 15-30 minutes/trip depending on route.

routes.question: How many bus routes are there in Nha Trang?
routes.answer: Currently Nha Trang has 4 main bus routes: Route 23 (Ana Marina - Vinpearl), Route 18 (Binh Hung - Dien Khanh), Route 9 (Bus station - Cam Ranh Airport), and Route 4 (Dam Market - South Bus Station).

airport.question: How to get from Cam Ranh Airport to Nha Trang center by bus?
airport.answer: You can take route 9 from Cam Ranh Airport to Nha Trang South Bus Station. Fare is 50,000Ä‘/trip, travel time about 45-60 minutes, operating from 04:00 - 21:00 with 30-minute frequency.

payment.question: Do Nha Trang buses accept card payment?
payment.answer: Currently most Nha Trang bus routes only accept cash payment. You should prepare exact change for tickets. Some routes are piloting cashless payment.

hero.title: Flights to Cam Ranh (CXR)
hero.subtitle: Check flight times, status and details of upcoming flights to Cam Ranh Airport - the aviation gateway to the coastal city of Nha Trang

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description1: Cam Ranh International Airport is located about 30km south of Nha Trang city center. It is the main aviation gateway for tourists visiting Nha Trang and surrounding areas in Khanh Hoa province.
intro.description2: The airport serves both domestic and international flights, with many airlines such as Vietnam Airlines, Bamboo Airways, VietJet Air, Pacific Airlines and many other international carriers.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.address: Address: Nguyen Tat Thanh, Cam Hai Dong, Cam Lam, Khanh Hoa

transportation.title: Transportation from Airport
transportation.taxi: Taxi: Available outside the terminal, travel time about 40-45 minutes to Nha Trang center.
transportation.bus: Bus: Bus route 18 from airport to city center.
transportation.shuttle: Hotel shuttle: Many hotels provide airport shuttle service, check when booking.
transportation.rental: Car rental: Car rental companies available at the airport.

items: Duty-free shops
Restaurants and cafes

Free Wi-Fi
Special assistance services
Child care services
VIP lounges

hero.title: Motorbike Taxi & Ride-hailing in Nha Trang
hero.subtitle: Compare traditional motorbike taxis and ride-hailing apps (Grab, Maxim) - Usage guide and fares

intro.title: Motorbike Taxis in Nha Trang
intro.description: Motorbike taxi is a popular and quick transportation method in Nha Trang, especially suitable for short distances within the city. Currently there are two main types: traditional motorbike taxis and app-based ride-hailing.
intro.warning: App-based ride-hailing is safer with fixed prices - Traditional motorbike taxis are flexible and negotiable

types.title: Types of Motorbike Taxis in Nha Trang

traditional.title: Traditional Motorbike Taxis
traditional.description: Traditional motorbike taxis usually gather at fixed points like markets, bus stations, hotel entrances, restaurants.
advantages: Available at many points in the city
No app needed, can book directly
Can negotiate prices for long distances
disadvantages: Need to negotiate price before departure

app.title: App-based Ride-hailing (Grab, Maxim)
app.description: App-based ride-hailing operates through mobile applications, providing convenient and transparent service.
disadvantages: May have long wait times during peak hours
Depends on number of online drivers
Prices may surge during peak hours

grab.name: Grab
grab.description: Leading Southeast Asian ride-hailing app, available in Nha Trang with GrabBike service.
cons: Prices may be high during rush hours
Long wait times during peak hours

maxim.name: Maxim
maxim.description: Ride-hailing app with competitive fares, increasingly popular in Nha Trang.

comparison.title: Comparison: Traditional vs App-based Motorbike Taxis

tips.title: Safe Motorbike Taxi Tips in Nha Trang

appBased.title: With app-based ride-hailing
items: Check driver information and license plate before boarding
Share trip details with family and friends
Always wear the provided helmet
Track your journey on the app
Rate the driver after the trip

traditional.title: With traditional motorbike taxis
items: Agree on fare clearly before departure
Choose drivers at official waiting points
Request helmet and check its quality
Remember license plate and inform relatives
Avoid traveling at night if not necessary

importantNotes.title: Important Notes
items: Don't use phone while traveling
Hold tight to bags and personal belongings
Prepare small bills for payment
Refuse if driver shows signs of intoxication or abnormal behavior

routes.title: Popular Routes and Estimated Fares

data.route: Cam Ranh Airport â†’ City Center
City Center â†’ Po Nagar Towers
City Center â†’ Bai Dai Beach

routes.note: * Fares may vary depending on time, traffic conditions and other factors. App-based ride-hailing prices include all fees, while traditional motorbike taxi fares are negotiable.

alternatives.title: Alternative Transportation
alternatives.description: Besides motorbike taxis, you can consider other transportation:

contactSection.title: Need help with transportation in Nha Trang?
contactSection.description: Contact us for advice on the most suitable transportation options for your trip

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Motorbike Taxis in Nha Trang

popularApps.question: Which ride-hailing apps are most popular in Nha Trang?
popularApps.answer: Grab and Maxim are the two main ride-hailing apps in Nha Trang. Grab has a wide driver network and many promotions, while Maxim offers competitive fares and local service.

pricing.question: How much do motorbike taxis cost in Nha Trang?
pricing.answer: App-based ride-hailing: 12,000-18,000Ä‘/km. Traditional motorbike taxis: 15,000-25,000Ä‘/km depending on distance. Prices may increase during peak hours or bad weather.

safety.question: How to ride motorbike taxis safely in Nha Trang?
safety.answer: Always wear a helmet, check driver information and license plate, share trip details with relatives. For traditional taxis, agree on price before departure.

availability.question: Do motorbike taxis operate 24/7?
availability.answer: App-based ride-hailing like Grab and Maxim operate 24/7 but fewer drivers available at night. Traditional motorbike taxis usually operate from 5:00-23:00.

choice.question: Should I choose traditional or app-based motorbike taxis?
choice.answer: App-based ride-hailing is safer with fixed prices and journey tracking. Traditional motorbike taxis are more flexible and allow price negotiation for short distances.
